name: No Bleach Allowed
description:
Look... The american president (the blonde one) has said numerous wrong things. We all remember our first covfefe.

Among those things, he actually adviced to ingest some form of cleaning product. 

DO NOT, IN ANY SHAPE OR FORM, INGEST CLEANING PRODUCT.

I shall insist.

In order to discourage you to do so, I created this little game ! Don't worry, not too much to think about ; you won't even have to move out of your car.

Steering the wheel, crash and destroy as much as cleaning products as you can. 

Even better ; your score is MULTIPLIED BY FIVE if you manage to push them into the incinerator. And who doesn't like explosions ?

Controls ; Mouse click to navigate into the menus, WASD or arrow keys for movement.

Tweet me your best score at @GlaasGD
